activities: We collect "Call Detail Records". This business segment is typically called "Call Accounting". We collect the calling records on behalf of large global enterprises. This would be information like "number dialed" and "duration of call". It is NOT the audio content of the call.
eucountries: Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: "Call Detail Records" on-line and off-line. We are a data processor. We do NOT record the audio content of telephone calls, only basic information like number dialed, and duration of call.
recoursemech: For human resources data: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC); For all other types of data: TRUSTe
